title: Cowboy Poets Gather At Annual Celebration
teaser: Cattle rancher Gaul Steiger comes from a long line of cowboy poets. We revisit our conversation with him.
contentencoded:
The 31st National Cowboy Poetry Gathering is underway in Elko, Nevada. Last year, Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson spoke with an attendee named Gaul Steiger, a cattle rancher who comes from a long line of cowboy poets. We revisit that conversation.

  • Read more and hear the original conversation in January 2014

Guest

  • Gail Steiger, songwriter, filmmaker and cattle rancher in Yavapai County, Arizona.
